title: API Client
description:
Build a reusable API client class for making HTTP requests.

## Requirements

1. Create an `ApiClient` class with:
   - Constructor that takes `baseUrl` string
   - Method `get(endpoint)` - makes GET request, returns JSON
   - Method `post(endpoint, data)` - makes POST request with JSON body, returns JSON
   - Method `put(endpoint, data)` - makes PUT request with JSON body, returns JSON
   - Method `delete(endpoint)` - makes DELETE request, returns boolean

2. All methods should:
   - Prepend baseUrl to endpoint
   - Include `Content-Type: application/json` header for POST/PUT
   - Throw Error with status code if response is not ok

## Expected Usage

```javascript
const api = new ApiClient('https://api.example.com');

const users = await api.get('/users');
const newUser = await api.post('/users', { name: 'Alice' });
await api.delete('/users/1');
```
hints: delete: return response.ok or check status === 200 || status === 204
